subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Since his return from a seven-month layoff because of a knee injury, Rafael Nadal has been particularly outspoken on the detrimental effects of hardcourt proliferation.
snippet: Since his return from a seven-month layoff because of a knee injury, Rafael Nadal has been particularly outspoken on the detrimental effects of hardcourt proliferation.
